item.description:
The Red Sox are done. Bobby V has been fired. But the MLB playoffs must go on.

The SanFrancisco Giants are down 2-0 on the brink of elimination.

Join San Francisco transplant and Giants fan Isabel to watch this early game at 5:30pm. The SOUND will be turned up per Manager Greg at Batter Park Bar.

Look for Isabel wearing the Giants hat and the Lou Seal Mascot.

Invite other fans and friends.

Battery Park has a great selection of beer and the food is great! (the Shepard's Pie!)  BP is a short walk from Downtown Crossing (Red and Orange Lines), Gov't Center (Green and Blue Lines), and Aquarium (Blue Line).  Everyone is responsible for their own food and drink. PLEASE MAINTAIN A SEPARATE TAB OR PAY AS YOU GO.

Hope to see you there!

 

Isabel
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Isabel in the Giants Shirt or just ask the bartender
item.name: NLDS Game Viewing Game 3 Giants @ Reds at Battery Park Bar
